sections.title: Play for two
sections.content:
it's important to know that sensual foreplay can make you feel very aroused and enjoy intercourse much more. Remember, foreplay is your way to create a sensational experience, learn what you both really like in bed, and enhance your pleasure when you are together.

I have always believed that the best sex occurs when you can be selfish in bed and allow yourself to really be present in the moment. However, in order to be mindful, you do need to choose one of the following roles, and agree upon the role with your partner before you start - either you will be the one who receives the pleasurable touch first, or the one who gives the pleasurable touch first

sections.title: Removing our clothes
sections.content: Removing our clothes and revealing our naked body can be very sensual if we choose to include that in our foreplay. The best way to do it is by gradually removing item after item, either from yourself or from your partner, while you include a sensual touch on the body. For example, if you remove your partner’s underwear, slowly pull them down as your finger strokes their legs ups and down

sections.title: Switch roles
sections.advisor: You all done! was this helpful for you?
sections.content: Lastly, don't forget to switch roles, either during the foreplay or the next time you dive into sensual and pleasurable foreplay.
